about_the_game:
• The demo includes specifications that differ to the full game.
  • Save data from the demo cannot be carried over to the full game.

A unique and immersive live-action mystery-adventure, surrounding the theme of eternal Life.
Solve an age-old mystery using your powers of deduction to uncover the truth.
Collect clues, establish a hypothesis, and use logic to break through the mysteries.

In this demo, you will be able to play the prologue (tutorial) and the first case, set in 1922, through to the point at which you unravel the mystery of the case.

■Story
The Shijima family have suffered a chain of inexplicable deaths over the past century.
When Haruka Kagami, a mystery novelist, visits the Shiijmas, she finds herself taking on four different murder cases - occurring at different points in time.

The red camellia and the Fruit of Youth, which invite only death.
And the truth behind it all, waiting to be uncovered...

content_descriptors.notes: The Centennial Case: A Shijima Story is a story of life and death. In uncovering the mystery of the Shijima family's chain of inexplicable deaths spanning a century, you will uncover acts of violence, crime and death.  Your investigations will contain imagery of blood, drugs and violence. The game contains adult themes and scenes some may find distressing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 240 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 730
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 30 FPS @ 1280x720
